mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, DEFAULT, #{memberName}, DEFAULT, #{memberGender}, #{memberAddress}, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, AUTHORITY_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_STATUS, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, TO_CHAR(LAST_MODIFIED_PW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_MODIFIED_PW_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE "MEMBER_EMAIL" = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_STATUS != 5
